pages.title: Best Pizza Delivery, Pick Up or Dine In | Order Online | Domino's MY
pages.meta_description: Enjoy freshly made & oven-baked pizzas, sides & desserts by delivery, takeaway or dine-in; Official website online ordering for over 250 stores nationwide.

h3: Domino's Pizza - The Best Pizza Delivery Expert In Malaysia

pages.text_content: Best Pizza Delivery, Pick Up or Dine In | Order Online | Domino's MY Bahasa menu Promotions locate Us My Account Menu Promotions locate Us Delivery Pick Up Order Now Order Now Order Now Domino's Pizza - The Best Pizza Delivery Expert In Malaysia It is our commitment to be the best pizza joint in Malaysia and offer great value for all pizza lovers from around the world. Domino's Pizza has won the hearts of many with a variety of great-tasting signature pizzas delivered quickly to your doorstep while maintaining the freshness and its state of piping hotness, for a hearty meal with family and friends. Domino's Pizza Malaysia has grown by leaps and bounds since it first began its operations in 1997. From a single store in USJ with a headcount of 15 staffs, the pizza chain today has over 260 stores in Malaysia and over 40 stores in Singapore with a headcount of over 4,000 staffs. Domino's Pizza Malaysia has grown strength to strength in providing great value through delicious pizzas delivered fast. Throughout time, Domino's has also been upgrading its menu and food choices by offering limited-time flavors and variety such as Cheese Volcano Pizza, Ssamjeang Pizza, and Mega Cheese Pizza. Searching For 'Food or Pizza Delivery Near Me'? Domino's Pizza Malaysia Is Just Around The Corner With Nationwide Delivery Look for a Domino's Pizza restaurant near you when you are in search of the best and freshest pizza. Be it for delivery or takeaway from the nearest Domino's pizza outlet, we have pizza makers ready to make fresh and hot pizzas to satisfy your cravings. Terms and Conditions *Surcharge applies for the following crusts (Cheese Burst & Cheese Tarik), Classics, First Class and Premium range. Illustrations shown are for representation only. Price is inclusive of 6% Service Tax. Prices are subject to change without prior notice. Pick Up is valid with a minimum of any purchase. Surcharge applies for extra condiments. Domino’s reserves the right to replace and/or amend the terms & conditions without prior notice. pages.title: Cheapest Pizza Delivery Promotions & Deals | Domino's MY
pages.meta_description: Check out our latest limited time pizza offers, vouchers & promotions. Grab these great deals for greater savings. Order now for Delivery or Pick-up!
pages.text_content: Cheapest Pizza Delivery Promotions & Deals | Domino's MY Bahasa menu Promotions locate Us My Account Menu Promotions locate Us Delivery Pick Up LUNCH DEAL (Until 4PM Only) BoxKu Lunch Deals (Until 4PM Only) Not sure what to get for your lunch? Don't miss out our BoxKu Lunch Deals (Until 4PM Only)! Grab them now! Order Now ALL-DAY DEALS Double Cheeseburger Pizza Do you see double?! Try our new Double Cheeseburger Pizzas now! Order Now Buy 1 Free 2 Try our new World Cheese Pizza now! Buy One and get Two more for FREE! Order Now 50% Off Pizzas Whether you are self-indulging or having a party, you can enjoy 50% off your pizza order starting from 1 pizza order (Available for Pick Up only). Order Now FUYOH COMBO Can't get enough? Order our FUYOH Combo for your family & friends! Order Now Infaq Kasih & Piza Spread love and kindness today with Domino’s Infaq Kasih & Piza. To place an order, simply enter the address of the recipient whom you wish to send the Infaq Kasih & Piza meal set to and choose the closest Domino's store for Abang and Kakak Domino's to deliver to the specified location on the selected charity home, the needy and underprivileged community on your behalf with free delivery. Order Now Terms and Conditions *Surcharge applies for the following crusts (Cheese Burst & Cheese Tarik), Classics, First Class and Premium range. Illustrations shown are for representation only. Price is inclusive of 6% Service Tax. Prices are subject to change without prior notice. Pick Up is valid with a minimum of any purchase. Surcharge applies for extra condiments. Domino’s reserves the right to replace and/or amend the terms & conditions without prior notice.
